articles.description: The WTC final will definitely be on the mind of the team management of both the captains as they take on each other in the third Test at the Motera Stadium in Ahmedabad.
articles.content: The race to reach the final of the World Test Championship is heating up. New Zealand have already qualified for the showpiece match after Australia's pullout of the tour of South Africa. India and E… [+2486 chars]
